law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 310, sec. 42, effective January 1, 1989. -- -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 333, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 29, sec. 49, effective June 18, 1970.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Valuations: standards - Certification of valuation, underlying data.
